User Documentation


Introduction

  • This web application enables the user (admin) to keep track of the patients, physicians and appointments made in the hospital at any time. It offers auto-scaling, high availability and voice based assistant; supports all platforms as it works on browser. Learn how to use the application with this documentation.

    • Getting Started
    Home Page

  • This page shows the current amount of patients, physicians and bookings. There are three functions that the home page holds for you.

    • Navigate to edit the patients' details through 'Patient Details' link.
    • Navigate to edit the physicians' details through 'Physician Details' link.
    • Finally, navigate to edit the appointments' details through 'Book Appointment' link.
  • The top navigation bar takes you to this homepage from anywhere in the application.

    • The Search Function

  • This search bar is present in every page containing details of patients, physicians and appointments. The search returns the matched results in real time.
    • Handling Patient Details

  • This page contains a table (list) of all the patients with the information name, insurance, address and contact number.
  • One can add a new patient by clicking the blue button 'Add Patient' and filling out the respective details shown. You can either save it by pressing the blue button or cancel the addition.
  • You can edit or delete the respective entry as shown in the page.

    • Handling Physician Details

  • This page contains a table (list) of all the physicians with the information name, address and contact number.
  • One can add a new physician by clicking the blue button 'Add Physician' and filling out the respective details shown. You can either save it by pressing the blue button or cancel the addition.
  • You can edit or delete the respective entry as shown in the page.

    • Handling Appointment Bookings

  • This page contains a table (list) of all the appointments with the information physician name, patient name and appointment date-time.
  • One can book an appointment by clicking the blue button 'Book Appointment' and filling out the respective details shown. You can either save it by pressing the blue button or cancel the addition.
  • You can delete the respective entry as shown in the page after the appointment is done or if it's cancelled.

    • Handling Voice Commands

  • The application comes with a voice assistant to assist you when your hands are full. Just follow this document to get a hang of it.
  • Navigating between pages: You can do that by simply saying "Go to patient details..." or "Book appointments", the application takes you to Patient Details page and Book Appointment page.
  • You can add patients, physicians or book appointments through voice. Just say, "Add Patient" when in Patient Details page. The application automatically opens up a form. Say, "Save" to save the changes and add the patient to the database, or say "cancel" to cancel the current addition.
  • You can always say "Go back", from any page to go back to the Home Page.
